text: Ojo on ki ʙar hamai mardum va amalhojason nozir ast, monandi ʙuton ast? Baroi Xudo sarikone qoil sudand. Bigu: «Onhoro nom ʙiʙared. Sojad mexohed Uro az cize dar rui zamin ogoh kuned, ki namedonad, jo suxanoni ʙehuda megujand?» Dar nazari kofiron makrason orosta omad va az rohi rost ʙeroh sudand. Va har kiro Xudo gumroh kunad, hec rohnamoe nadorad
